title: PvP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body: help pls this keeps happening when I start LoL, is it just me or does anyone else having this issue, If so please let me know :D

replies.body: Kernal errors usually occurs when the patcher needs to launch and scan files, but is being blocked by a security setting,   Going over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to allow access should get this fixed up.  Hope that helps!
I'm having the exact same issue, I've even tried uninstalling and reinstalling, I did a virus scan etc... at this point I'm thinking it's not on my end lol
best of luck for you, lets hope someone can help us
